hanzi-su-wiki:
側

Значения

Сторона, бок

Мнемоника

  • Правило 則 боя. Впереди — рыцари, а простолюдины 亻 — на флангах, где натиск не так силён. Боковая сторона.

  • "Я положил деньги и нож на мою сторону."

Варианты

侧

опираться на одну сторону

jp_example_words:
縁側(えんがわ): veranda, porch, balcony, open corridor
側(かわ): side, row, surroundings, part, (watch) case
側(がわ): side, row, surroundings, part, (watch) case
側面(そくめん): side, flank, sidelight, lateral
側(そば): near, close, beside, vicinity, proximity, besides, while
両側(りょうがわ): both sides
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader of the shellfish has a knife in its side. It's fine though, don't worry, it's just a reminder that he won the great shellfish war back when they were trying to choose the new leader.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the shellfish leader in your mind and make sure to pay special attention to the knife that's sticking out of his side. It's right in the groove of his shell.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Because of this knife in his side, he can't pronounce certain words correctly. The most obvious one is when he says 川 (かわ), but it comes out of the side of his mouth as がわ.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Try saying かわ out the side of your mouth like the leader of the shellfish and you'll probably say がわ too. Don't stick a knife in your side though, we won't pay your medical bills when you complain to us that this mnemonic got you injured.
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), ハ, 刈 (косить), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: cè: (сущ/глаг) сторона, бок; крениться набок, склоняться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) keeps the rule (則) by his side
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T knows that to rule you need to think outside of the box, i.e. in a lateral way.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription starts with " person " and " the " sound, the original meaning is side. Jin Wen means sidelines, no slaps: "Side (right) side tiger ministers." Huchen was a military commander of the Zhou dynasty. "Right side tiger ministers", also known as "left and right tiger ministers", means the general and the lieutenant. Jin Wen also said that the name of the official service, inquiring "side new", pronounced "salary", referring to the low-level labor such as salaries and woodcutters.

"Shuowen": "The side is also. From the person to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "If it is not right, it means "Zeng", "If it is not in the middle, it means side."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription starts with " person " and " the " sound, the original meaning is side.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「人」，「則」聲，本義是旁邊。金文表示旁側，無叀鼎：「遉(正)側虎臣」，虎臣是周代的武將，「正側虎臣」，又稱「左右虎臣」，表示正將和副將。金文又表示職役名，詢簋「側新」，讀作「鍘薪」，指薪樵砍柴之類的賤役。

　　《說文》：「旁也。从人則聲。」段玉裁注：「不正曰仄，不中曰側。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「人」，「則」聲，本義是旁邊。

金文從「 人 」，「 則 」聲，本義是旁邊。金文表示旁側，無叀鼎：「遉(正)側虎臣」，虎臣是周代的武將，「正側虎臣」，又稱「左右虎臣」，表示正將和副將。金文又表示職役名，詢簋「側新」，讀作「鍘薪」，指薪樵砍柴之類的賤役。 《說文》：「旁也。从人則聲。」段玉裁注：「不正曰仄，不中曰側。」
Bronze inscription starts with " person" and " the" sound, the original meaning is side. Jin Wen means sidelines, no slaps: "Side (right) side tiger ministers." Huchen was a military commander of the Zhou dynasty. "Right side tiger ministers", also known as "left and right tiger ministers", means the general and the lieutenant. Jin Wen also said that the name of the official service, inquiring "side new", pronounced "salary", referring to the low-level labor such as salaries and woodcutters. "Shuowen": "The side is also. From the person to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "If it is not right, it means "Zeng", "If it is not in the middle, it means side."

側字的基本解释

側
cè

側
zè

側
zhāi
均见“侧”。

側字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cè］
［《廣韻》阻力切，入職，莊。］
“侧1”的繁体字。
(1)旁边。
(2)用作谦词。
(3)倾斜。
(4)不公正；不正派。
(5)僻远。
(6)独；特。
(7)瘗埋。《左传·襄公二十五年》：“崔氏側莊公于北郭。”杜预注：“側，瘞埋之。”清袁枚《随园随笔·诸经》：“三《傳》多古字，余嘗戲集之。在《左氏》則……埋曰側。”一说侧为厕。清汪中《经义知新记》：“襄十五年《傳》：'崔氏側莊公于北郭。'側與廁同。”
(8)藏伏。
(9)轻微。
(10)汉字笔画中“点”的古称。参见“永字八法”。
(11)通“惻”。悲伤。
[②]［zè］
［《廣韻》阻力切，入職，莊。］
“侧2”的繁体字。
(1)通“仄”。古音以上、去、入三声为仄声，与平声相对。
(2)通“仄”。偪仄；狭窄。
(3)通“昃”。太阳偏西之时。
[③]［zhāi］
［《廣韻》阻力切，入職，莊。］
“侧3”的繁体字。
倾斜。参见“側3歪”、“側3棱”、“側3不楞”。

側字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　側； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第34
【唐韻】阻力切【集韻】【韻會】札色切，?音㳁。旁也，傾也。【詩·召南】在南山之側。【書·洪範】無反無側。【註】不偏邪也。　又?隘也。【書·堯典】明明揚側陋。　又叛黨曰反側。【後漢·光武紀】使反側子自安。　又【儀禮·旣夕】有司請祖期曰日側。【註】側，昳也。謂將過中之時。與?同。　又側注，冠名。酈食其服以見沛公。　又側生，茘支名。　又與特通。【儀禮·士冠禮】側尊一甒醴。【註】特設一尊醴也。又【聘禮】公側授宰玉。又側授宰幣。【註】謂君特授，不假相也。　又同仄。【史記·平準書】公卿鑄鏱官赤側。【註】赤側，錢名。

考證：〔【禮·聘禮】公側授宰玉。又側授宰幣。〕　謹照本書之例上禮字改又字。
側字的源字形

暂无。

side
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cè］
["Guangyun" resistance cut, entry, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters for "side 1".
(1) Next to it.
(2) Used as a modest word.
(3) Tilt.
(4) Injustice; not decent.
(5) Remote.
(6) Independent; special.
(7) Buried. "Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Gong": "Cui's side Zhuang Gong was in Beiguo." Du's note: "Side, bury it." Qing Yuanmei "Suiyuan Essays · All Classics": "Three "Biography" Many ancient characters, I will taste the drama. In "Zuo Shi", it is...buried and said to the side. "The side is the toilet. Qing Wangzhong's "Jing Yi Zhi Xin Ji": "Xiang Fifteenth "Biography":'Cui's side Zhuang Gong Yu Beiguo.' The side is the same as the toilet."
(8) Hidden.
(9) Slight.
(10) The ancient name for "dot" in the strokes of Chinese characters. See "Eight Laws of Yongzi".
(11) Through "comfort". sad.
[②]［zè］
["Guangyun" resistance cut, entry, Zhuang. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "side 2".
(1) Through "Ze". The three tones above, to go, and to enter the ancient accents are zep, opposite to the flat sound.
(2) Through "Ze". Squeeze; narrow.
(3) Through "Zhang". When the sun is west.
[③] [zhāi]
["Guangyun" resistance cut, entry, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters for "side 3".
tilt. See "Side 3 skewed", "Side 3 edges", "Side 3 not stunned".
side

[Tang Yun] Resistance cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zha color cut, sound 㳁. Side also, Qing also. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】On the side of Nanshan Mountain. [Book·Hong Fan] There is no opposite and no side. [Note] Not partial to evil.　 Again? [Book·Yao Dian] Ming Ming Yang side shabby.　 Betrayed the party again and said the opposite. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] Make the opposite side self-settling.　[Yi Li·Xi Xi] A secretary asked the ancestors to ask for the day. [Note] Side, Ye Ye. That the time is about to pass. Same as?　Side note again, naming. Li Shiqi served to see Pei Gong.　Side birth again, the name of the branch.　And special communication. 【Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony】The side respects a scorpion. [Note] There is a special statue of Li Ye. And [Beauty Ceremony] The public side awarded Zaiyu. He also awarded coins to the side. cè
вм. 侧

側

Значения

Сторона, бок

Мнемоника

  • Правило 則 боя. Впереди — рыцари, а простолюдины 亻 — на флангах, где натиск не так силён. Боковая сторона.

  • "Я положил деньги и нож на мою сторону."

Варианты

侧

Radicals: ｲ, 貝, 刂  (leader, shellfish, knife)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader of the shellfish has a knife in its side. It's fine though, don't worry, it's just a reminder that he won the great shellfish war back when they were trying to choose the new leader.
Picture the shellfish leader in your mind and make sure to pay special attention to the knife that's sticking out of his side. It's right in the groove of his shell.
Reading Mnemonic
Because of this knife in his side, he can't pronounce certain words correctly. The most obvious one is when he says 川 (かわ), but it comes out of the side of his mouth as がわ.
Try saying かわ out the side of your mouth like the leader of the shellfish and you'll probably say がわ too. Don't stick a knife in your side though, we won't pay your medical bills when you complain to us that this mnemonic got you injured.
